bug.summary: Visualizer gets stuck on key callback
bug.description:
Describe the bug VisualizerWithKeyCallback does not call my callback when I press the key, and stops responding to any input. To Reproduce
Load geometry Run the custom_draw_geometry_with_key_callback function (from here) on it. Press the K key The window freezes, and no change happens.
Expected behavior The background color changes to black, and the visualizer keeps running. Screenshots n/a Environment (please complete the following information):
OS: OSX High Sierra 10.13.6 Python version: 3.7.2 Open3D version: 0.5.0.0 Is this remote workstation?: no How did you install Open3D?: pip
Additional context This issue occurs with any uses of VisualizerWithKeyCallback, whether via draw_geometries_with_key_callbacks, or creating the class myself and running the rendering loop myself.

comments.comment: Could you provide us a minimum code example? I will close this in the meantime.
